name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its yellow color and lightning bolt-shaped tail.

name: Charizard
description: Charizard is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon and the final evolution of Charmander.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a Water-type Pokémon known for its blue color and water-based attacks.

name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon and is one of the original starters.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its multiple evolution possibilities.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon known for its singing and sleep-inducing abilities.

name: Gengar
description: Gengar is a dual-type Ghost/Poison Pokémon known for its mischievous nature.

name: Mewtwo
description: Mewtwo is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its immense psychic powers.

name: Snorlax
description: Snorlax is a large and sleepy Normal-type Pokémon known for blocking paths.

name: Machamp
description: Machamp is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its impressive muscles and strength.

name: Gyarados
description: Gyarados is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon known for its fierce and intimidating appearance.

name: Alakazam
description: Alakazam is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its high intelligence and psychic abilities.

name: Dragonite
description: Dragonite is a Dragon/Flying-type Pokémon known for its friendly and gentle nature.

name: Vaporeon
description: Vaporeon is a Water-type Pokémon known for its aquatic abilities and water-based attacks.

name: Greninja
description: Greninja is a Water/Dark-type Pokémon known for its ninja-like appearance and swift movements.
